It will be helpful to access the full repository for this workshop, for the data, covariates and any template scripts to get started. There are a couple ways to do this.

1. **Fork the repository on GitHub**:
This requires having a GitHub account.

Go to the GitHub page for the repository: <https://github.com/swforrest/ESA2025_animal_movement_workshop>

Click on the "Fork" button at the top right of the page. This will create a copy of the repository in your own GitHub account.

2. **Download the repository as a ZIP file**:
You can do this by clicking on the green "Code" button at the top right of the GitHub page and selecting "Download ZIP". Once downloaded, unzip the file to a location on your computer where you can easily find it.
